description: Enjoy the flavours of mulled wine with these sugar-coated jellies. Why not pop them in a festive box and give them to loved ones as the perfect edible gift?
name: Mulled Wine Jellies Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Spray a 20cm (5cm deep) square cake pan with oil.

Combine caster sugar, cinnamon, cloves, rind, vanilla and 1 cup water in a medium saucepan over high heat and bring to the boil. Reduce heat to low and simmer, uncovered, for 5 minutes or until sugar has dissolved and mixture is fragrant.

Add wine and glucose, then bring to the boil over high heat. Remove pan from heat. Sprinkle over gelatine and whisk until dissolved. Strain mixture into cake pan. Stand for 6 hours or until set (do not refrigerate).
Place white sugar on a baking tray. Cut jelly into 4cm squares, then roll in sugar to coat completely. Serve.
